entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.2Â°C

Observed at: Badger 1:30 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
Temperature: 6.2°C

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow before morning. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
